title: Sitefinity 3.x Windows 7 64-bit Installation
content:
Just had a hard time installing Sitefinity 3.7 SP1 Project Manager on my 64-bit Windows 7 PC.  I was getting a generic 401 IIS Error.

Turns out there’s a step missing from the installation doc…turn on Enable 32-bit Applications on the Classic ASP.NET AppPool! :)
seoDescription: Getting Sitefinity 3.x up and running on windows 7 64
